## UPCOMING LEGISLATIVE HEARINGS ---

## LIVE VIDEO FEED

![](https://council.nyc.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/livestream-overlay2.png)

### Select a stream:

### Visit the Council

We're located at [New York City Hall.](https://www.google.com/maps/place/New+York+City+Hall/@40.7127744,-74.008253,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c258fda88cefb3:0x7f1e88758d210007) Council Members each have an office at [250 Broadway](https://www.google.com/maps/place/250+Broadway,+New+York,+NY+10007/@40.7129838,-74.010099,17z/data=!4m7!1m4!3m3!1s0x89c258828f59541d:0x539864ce22092177!2s250+Broadway,+New+York,+NY+10007!3b1!3m1!1s0x89c258828f59541d:0x539864ce22092177), as well as offices in each of their districts.

### We want to hear from you

You can reach us via social media, email, paper mail, or at your district office. For issues specific to a neighborhood, it's best to [contact the Council Member representing that community.](/districts/)

Have questions, comments or feedback? [Email us here.](mailto:correspondence@council.nyc.gov)
